title: The Star Knight - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Mecha   Sci-fi   Yaoi
tags: Appearance Changes   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Artificial Intelligence   Bickering Couple   Clones   Futuristic Setting   Hiding True Identity   Knights   Manipulative Characters   Manly Gay Couple   Mercenaries   Naive Protagonist   Outer Space   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger
author: Fei Tian Ye Xiang   非天夜翔
description:
A song from within the depth of the cosmos. A protagonist with curious beginnings encounters a Star Knight, steering starships deeper yet into space to lead us on a journey full of adventures and unknowns. 

Klorin, the dark King of Falling Star. The death of a hundred billion stars and the life of the man-made god, Yshzur.

The Republic, the Empire, and the Legion of Falling Star. These three major forces would bring about a ruthless annexation of the Last Utopia.>
